title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Tassel of linen, braided and knotted. Single loop attached to pear-shaped center from which hang balls attached to clusters of knottings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-46.
